name: Cyber-Angel
description:
Play as AMBER, an android trying to escape the fortified facilities of Cybernet. Indulge in long range combat against guards, evade lasers and other booby traps and hack the facility systems to obtain keycards.

|Game Story|

Human soldiers gradually becoming irrelevant and deemed impotent in the battle field due to their ‘humanity’

Cybernet a top secret tech foundation created A.M.B.E.R the ( Autonomous Machine Built for Expendables Reasons)

They imbedded an A.I vocal assistant into its systems for guidance , but upon its awakening, it had a different mind of its own.
